name: Truck Driver: The American Dream
summary: Truck Driver: The American Dream is a truck-driving simulation game that is setting out to mix storytelling. Start from the bottom and work your way to the top in the name of getting your life together and chasing the American Dream. Truck Driver: The American Dream is launching in 2023.
